string.text: "Stalker" Energy Drink

It is often used by stalkers in multi-day hikes when there is no opportunity to stop and rest. The drink contains easily digestible carbohydrates, as well as drugs that cause the release of adrenaline into the blood.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]specifications:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulator
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] strong sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] healthy eating
Energy Drink Non Stop

Excellent energy drink Non Stop. It contains caffeine, taurine and a powerful vitamin complex that relieves fatigue and adds strength. Unable to take even a step? Then this is exactly what you need.

Iron Mug

An ordinary iron mug. An indispensable thing both on the Mainland and in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]specifications:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] widespread use
Tablespoon

An ordinary iron tablespoon. An indispensable thing both on the Mainland and in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]specifications:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] widespread use
Thermos

A type of household thermal insulation cookware for long-term preservation of a higher or lower temperature of food products, compared with the ambient temperature. It is a kind of Dewar vessel.The thermos can be used not only for storing ready-made drinks and food, but also for their preparation, for example, various infusions and porridges. It was developed at the Research Institute of Lukashuk.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]specifications:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] widespread use
Thermos with tea

Thermos with strong tea.

Beef

Your favorite beef is perfectly seasoned and moderately salty, it will support your strength for several hours. This separate batch was collected from the best meat in the Zone, so the side effects are slightly weaker than from a typical stalker diet.

Olives

A fresh jar of olives, there are no others in the Zone. A popular and very marketable product among stalkers, but quickly spoiling in the conditions of the zone.

Presumably, canned food from an army food warehouse stolen by stalkers; it is not possible to establish exactly because of the absence of any label. The main thing is that the expiration date does not seem to have expired yet.

Toilet paper

In the Zone, toilet paper is highly valued and therefore stalkers immediately buy everything from merchants. Of course, burdocks have not been canceled, but still ordinary toilet paper is much nicer.

 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] widespread use
>Sweet corn "Bonduelle"

Sweet corn beans "Bonduelle". A great breakfast for every stalker. All the corn is made from the highest grade!

Green peas with carrots in cubes. "Tender peas with diced carrots in a sweet marinade, one of the best breakfasts of every stalker.

White beans in tomato sauce "Bonduelle"

White beans in tomato sauce "Piquant". A ready-made dish, magnificent in its simplicity and nutritiousness. Light tomato sauce successfully emphasizes and enriches the taste of white beans. And if you add it to scrambled eggs and bacon, you will get a traditional English breakfast - hearty and healthy, giving the body the necessary proteins, carbohydrates, fiber and iron.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]specifications:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] healthy eating
Red beans "Bonduelle"

Red beans in their own juice are an ideal component for sauces and hot dishes: cooked according to classical technology, the beans have a more crumbly texture, and the light aroma of sweet pepper and garlic organically complements its taste.

 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported

Olives "Bonduelle"

Olives with a stone. A little sunny Spanish happiness — this is how you can describe the taste of Bonduelle olives. Therefore, you can not do without them in the preparation of delicious and elegant snacks, especially canapes and tartlets. In a jar in which you will never find excess water, only carefully selected in size, mature fruits with a balanced taste get into.
